divs: Sighting DetailsHusband and I were sitting on deck steps and talking (we had nothing to drink and no mind altering substances of any kind!!!)....looked up and our jaws dropped. My husband is not a believer in UFO's but cannot explain that. It seemed to go so SLOWLY. NO NOISE AT ALL. VERY SLOW. COVERED IN AMBER LIGHTS....Vanished after 5 minutes.. Size of football field. Bronzish in color Just COVERED IN AMBER lights......I have since read about accidentally summoning motherships.....I wonder if either one of us accidentally did this!!!! Now my husband believes....and he is an analytical scientific "prove it to me" type. Maybe thats why he saw it too!!!! It was flying from our left to the right ....after 5 minutes it vanished into thin air!!!! (to our right)
Summary: Low in sky near roof of house...SILENT....SLOW....Amber Lights....as big as football field...rectangu
